title: Ariane 5 to launch advanced broadband satellite for Eutelsat
summary: Europe’s Ariane 5 rocket will return to action Tuesday, deploying a high-power communications satellite for French operator Eutelsat. Liftoff from the Centre Spatial Guyanais in Kourou, French Guiana is scheduled for 6:45 p.m. EDT (21:45 UTC) with the opening of a 66-minute launch window.

title: India’s Skyroot Aerospace raises $51 million ahead of inaugural launch
summary: Skyroot Aerospace says the round will fund “infrastructure and initial developmental launches, enabling us to achieve commercial operations next year.”

title: Near Space Labs offers free imagery for researchers
summary: Near Space Labs announced plans Sept. 7 to provide free high-resolution Earth imagery to researchers, universities and nonprofit organizations.

title: BAE Systems developing multi-sensor satellite cluster for military intelligence
summary: BAE Systems said Sept. 7 it is developing its first multi-sensor satellite cluster to gather intelligence for military and disaster response needs in 2024.

title: Albedo announces $48 million Series A funding round
summary: Earth observation startup Albedo raised $48 million in a Series A funding round.
